pageContext.claim: “As I predicted, Jay Powell and the Federal Reserve have allowed the Dollar to get so strong, especially relative to ALL other currencies, that our manufacturers are being negatively affected. Fed Rate too high. They are their own worst enemies, they don't have a clue. Pathetic!”
pageContext.analysis: A strong dollar does make U.S. exports more expensive abroad, but pinning what’s happening in manufacturing on just the dollar is short sighted. Most analysts agree that manufacturing falling into a recession is evidence that Trump’s tariffs are harming the U.S. economy.
